name: Moroccan Brain
steps: Wash the brain thoroughly in salted water with 1 tsp of vinegar. Remove the membrane covering it and rinse with water. Cut in half.
Place all the ingredients (garlic, grated tomatoes, sweet/hot paprika, tomato paste, olive oil, pepper, salt, parsley, bay leaves) in a saucepan or tagine.
Let simmer for a bit (5 minutes), then add the halved brain and add water (just enough to slightly cover).
Cover and cook on low heat for about half an hour.
Let it reduce to obtain a thick, creamy sauce. Serve hot.
